entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:07 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
